phrs.translation: 喷气机用煤油，航空煤油
煤油引擎，煤油机；煤油发动机

sentences.sentence: A leakage of kerosene has polluted water supplies.
sentences.translation: 泄漏的煤油已污染了水源。

sentences.sentence: "What if there is no kerosene this winter?" said Al.—"So what?" she said. "We still have electricity."
sentences.translation: “今年冬天如果没有煤油可怎么办呢？”阿尔说。—“那又怎么样？”她说。“我们还有电呢。”

sentences.sentence: With a flash, the kerosene lamp went out.
